title: Luxury house for sale in Malabe
details: Architect designed fully furnished house with indoor gardens, 3 bed rooms with AC and attached bathrooms , Office room with Ac, 2 servant rooms one with attached bathroom and one with common bathrooms , Large living and dining area, pantry with modern fittings, CCTV, Solar hot water, Solar electricity (Net metering) 2 car parking slots, 5 mins. to highway and SLIIT, 10 mins, to Neville Fernando hospital. jogging track and monorail hub,
